title: How I Find KDP Niche Ideas FAST!!

tactics.name: Redbubble Trend Analysis
tactics.description: Use Redbubble's best-selling journals to identify trending niche categories and cover design ideas
steps: Check Amazon for related search terms
source_quotes: engineering notebook has 3,600 searches on Google per month

tactics.name: Etsy Printable Insights
tactics.description: Discover low-content book ideas through Etsy's printable and journal categories
steps: Browse Etsy's gifts and journals/planners sections
caveats: May require content adaptation for KDP
source_quotes: search for printables... see what's selling well

tactics.name: Amazon Keyword Search
tactics.description: Use Amazon's search bar to identify high-volume keywords and existing products.
steps: Search for terms like 'beer tasting', check search volume
Analyze BSR and review counts for existing products
caveats: May miss niche opportunities in less popular categories
source_quotes: put in beer tasting, does anything come up? Yes. A beer tasting journal with 70 searches per month

tactics.name: Wikipedia Sports List
tactics.description: Leverage Wikipedia's sports list to create training/dietary log books.
caveats: Requires time to cover all sports categories
source_quotes: search for a list of sports and I created a lot of books around training log books

heuristics.name: Review Volume Filter
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are less than 200, prioritize for low-competition opportunities
source_quotes: books with lots of reviews... are making lots of sales

heuristics.name: Event Timing Strategy
heuristics.condition: If publishing two to three months ahead of holidays/celebrations, boost keyword visibility
source_quotes: publish a book two to three months ahead of when these dates are

claims.statement: Amazon's search suggestions reveal consumer demand patterns
source_quotes: Amazon is actually telling us what people are searching for

claims.statement: Book sellers invest millions in marketing to predict trends
source_quotes: they've probably spent hundreds of thousands, maybe millions of dollars on marketing

niche_patterns.description: Combine specific audience identities with targeted problems and unique constraints
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Creates hyper-specific niches with untapped market potential
source_quotes: investigate later in terms of competitiveness and profitability
